cu.explanation_en: Setting Num_Threads_PUSCH to a negative value will cause initialization failure as thread count must be positive.

du.explanation_en: Setting maxMIMO_layers to 10 exceeds the supported maximum, causing configuration validation error.
du.explanation_zh: 將 maxMIMO_layers 設定為 10 超過支援的最大值，導致配置驗證錯誤。
